import React from 'react'; import { Alert, Button, } from 'bootstrap-styled'; export default class AlertDismissExample extends React.Component { state = { visible: true, }; onDismiss = () => { this.setState({ visible: false }); }; render() { return ( <div> <Alert color="info" isOpen={this.state.visible} toggle={this.onDismiss}> I am an alert and I can be dismissed! </Alert> <Button className="btn btn-primary" onClick={this.resetCloseAlert}>Reset alert</Button> <div> ) } }
